msgs: I am Welcome Bot, and I am here to help you get started!
Please complete the following steps as soon as possible:
*1. Add a profile picture and cover photo to your account.*
*2. Add your role, department, and manager to your profile.*
_Manager: A manager should have been assigned to you. If you are an Alumus, your manager is "Alluminati"._
*3. Go over your preferences and settings.*
_Such as general settings, private settings, and notification settings._
*4. Join the groups and follow people you will interact with.*
_Note: you don't need to join a group to see the posts from that group._
